title: Why doesn\'t the NC DOT afix yellow with black lettering signage, stating \EXIT ONLY\" on the over-the road sign depicting the Jacksonville/Wrightsville Beach exit on northbound College Road @ Market Street?? Traffic very often makes quick lane-changing decisions on this very busy roadway."
text:
NCDOT will look into the matter, spokeswoman Jennifer Garifo says.

  ñThe North Carolina Department of Transportation has not received
any complaints regarding this exit,î she says. ñWe will investigate
and determine if making this change would be appropriate and
beneficial.î
